name: aluminium oxide factory construction | aluminium oxide factory | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8833/documentation

Medium sized plant. Output: 800'000 t/a, life time: 50 years;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts from the transformation of unspecified land to industrial area.

Part of the Al2O3 plant needed only for Al2O3 fabrication (= calcination and Al2O3 storage) including disposal.
category: F:Construction/41:Construction of buildings/410:Construction of buildings/4100:Construction of buildings
